name: Pizza Tower - peppino's pistol and chainsaw experience
name_original: Pizza Tower - peppino's pistol and chainsaw experience
description:
basically this mod adds in back chainsaw and pistol
you can aim with pistol but it wont hurt enemies and it just breaks blocks
chainsaw breaks blocks and destroys enemies
controls =
x - shift
c - grab
s - taunt
a - pistol
a + up - pistol up
a + up + left (a + up + right) - pistol diagonal
v - chainsaw
have fun
